description: A shortish bushwack to some lesser know falls on Morar Brook..  If you go there, also visit large falls like Wallace or MacEachern Brooks nearby to make it worth your while!
directions: Highway 337.  Morar brook has two branches flowing under highway.  One is at; N45.84895° W61.99067°.  Follow it downstream for about 700m to the fall
title: Morar Brook Fall
